item.title: 5.1.1 Summary Devices
item.description: Summary device # Device aggregation is to summarize all the basic information of each device according to 1 day/many days in the account. Statistics of speed, total distance, fuel in the time you choose. To view the Device Summary Report do the following: Choose Reports > Reports > Summary (device). Search # Step 1 : You can search by the following criteria: Date : Select available or optional time.

item.title: 5.1.2 Summary by Days
item.description: Summary by days # Daily summary is to summarize all the basic information on a day-to-day basis of each device in the account. Statistics of speed, distance, fuel by day. To view the reports Summary by days do the following: Choose Reports > Reports > Summary by days. Search # Step 1 : You can search by the following criteria: Date : Select available or optional time.

item.title: 5.1.3 Summary Geofence
item.description: Summary geofence # Aggregate by region is to summarize how many times that device enters that warning area, how many times a day. How long is the total time in the warning zone. To view the Report Geofence Summary, do the following: Choose Reports > Reports > Summary geofence 1. Search # Step 1 : You can search by the following criteria: Date : Select available or optional time.

item.title: 5.1.4 Detail Geofence
item.description: Detail geofence # Details of entering and exiting the area are detailed statistics of each time in and out of the warning area in that day. Example: 1 day in/out with 5 alarms. Then it must be counted 5 times in / out there, when and when. To view the detailed report of access to the area, do the following: Choose Reports > Reports > Detail geofence.

item.title: 5.1.5 Data log
item.description: Data log # Historical data is the detailed statistics of the vehicle’s journey history. To view the Historical Data Report do the following: Choose Reports > Report > Data log. Search # Step 1 :You can search by the following criteria: Date : Select available or optional time. Device : Click on a device you want to see the report.

item.title: 5.1.6 Routes
item.description: Routes # The route is the vehicle route statistics in the state: Running, as well as the travel time, the starting-ending location, the distance, the speed of the vehicle in a period of time. To view the Route Report do the following: Choose Reports > Reports > Route. Search # Step 1 : You can search by the following criteria: Date : Select available or optional time.

item.title: 5.1.7 Simple routes
item.description: Simple routes # Simple routes is the vehicle route statistics in the state: Running, as well as the travel time, the starting-ending location, the speed of the vehicle in a period of time. To view the Simple routes Report do the following: Choose Reports > Reports > Simple routes. Search # Step 1 : You can search by the following criteria: Date : Select available or optional time.

item.title: 5.1.8 Status History
item.description: Status history # Status history is the status statistics of the Trip/Engine/Air Conditioner and other information of each route and device in the currently logged in/selected account. To view the Status History Report do the following: Choose Reports > Reports > Status history. Search # Step 1 : You can search by the following criteria: Date : Select available or optional time.

item.title: 5.1.9 Toll fee
item.description: Toll fee # To have the data displayed in Toll Station Report , users do the following in the following order: 1. Open advanced feature # First, the user must activate the Toll station card and select Type of transport, do the following: Step 1 : Click on Map > Info on the device list box. Step 2 : A dialog box as shown above appears.

item.title: 5.1.10 Engine hours
item.description: Engine hours # Engine hours is the statistics of how long does the car start in a day, during that time, does the car move to work (with a total distance of how much), or just stop in one place. And other information attached. To view the Engine hours Report, do the following: Choose Reports > Reports > Engine hours. Search # Step 1 : You can search by the following criteria: Date : Select available or optional time.
